title: Last Week's Top Stories - Federal Agents in Portland, OR & Trump Floats Delaying the 2020 Election
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - Federal Agents in Portland, OR & Trump Floats Delaying the 2020 Election
description:
President Trump dismisses calls to withdraw federal troops from Portland, OR, Tom Cotton opposes a 1619 Project-inspired curriculum, and Trump calls to delay the election.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
